# Code Cycle Startup
# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE!

# Add any new or externally modified files
/git add .
/commit

# Output cycle start timestamp
/run scripts/start_cycle.py

# load project docs and IO
/read automation/RULES.txt

/add docs/PRD.md
/add docs/Design_Documentation.md
/add docs/Planning_and_Progress.md
/add docs/DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST.md

/add automation/TODO.txt
/add automation/MANAGER.txt

# Startup is done, go to first Code Cycle step
/load automation/01_STEP_1.txt
